Name: [Freeze] Freezing Gloves
Desc: Triggering Ice Mark additionally increases the Agent's <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>60%</color>.
Desc2: Other than keeping the wearer's hands warm, they can shoot a cold mist from the fingertips. Just make sure you aren't too close to the target when using this function. You could get frozen right along with them.
